column4: This isnt a Ubuntu question but maybe someone will know...How do I get to f2 terminal in Knoppix without doing ctrl+alt+f2?
/ FactTech Its an assignment for college :( Gotta get to f2 tty, cant use GUI. Any way to kill x completely? Killing Xorg restarts it.
/ hunchybunch , get to f2. Vmware wont pass through my ctrl+alt+f2 else I would use it :(
